itemDescription: British Army officer, racecourse manager and courtier

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Anthony Hwfa Williams (1849/50–1926) was a British Army officer and racecourse manager. A figure of the Marlborough House Set, he was a close associate of the future Edward VII of the United Kingdom, and his wife Mrs. Hwfa Williams (née Farquharson) a leader of the fashionable world.
